title: Fury
description: A courageous dragon-shifter faces murder, intrigue, fierce foes, and intruders from beyond the stars with advanced weapons.Galindra still mourns her mother’s mysterious disappearance and yearns to discover the truth. She’s an investigator possessing special powers, tasked with probing into a nobleman’s baffling abduction and a savage slaying. Sparks fly when she encounters strange newcomers from an unknown planet named Earth wielding futuristic weapons. She resolves to unravel their true purpose, solve the murder, rescue the prince, and protect thousands of innocents from brutal massacre.But her biggest challenge is to stay one step ahead of a homicidal witch who’s out for blood—hers.Fury is the exciting first book in The ForeSender Chronicles series, a cross-genre fantasy/sci-fi action adventure mashup. If you like a grief stricken but determined female protagonist, shadowy enemies with hidden agendas, space marines versus magic, and barbarous creatures wreaking widespread mayhem, then this imaginative, fast-paced novel is for you.Author Adrian Murphy invites you to grab your copy and join Galindra’s quest today.
author: Adrian Murphy
